alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:09AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 145 AM EDT... At 109 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Golden Gate Estates, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Picayune Strand State Forest, Bunker Hill, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, and Lake Trafford. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
